db:abstract.db:para: Control all active sound instances by group.

db:para.db:emphasis: This type is under development and is subject to change.

db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: An instance of AudioCategory can be accessed through AudioEngine.categories with its unique name and must be defined inside AudioEngine or be added to it using AudioEngine.addAudioCategory() if AudioCategory is created dynamically.
Sound instances can be grouped together by specifying the category property. When you change the volume of a category, all audio output from related instances will be affected as well.
Note: there will always be an AudioCategory named default whether you explicitly define it or not. If you do not specify any category for a Sound, it will be grouped into the default category.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of AudioCategory. The name must be unique among all categories and only defined once. The name cannot be changed after the instance has been initialized.

db:section.db:title: volume : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the volume of the category and will modulate all audio output from the instances which belong to this category.

db:section.db:title: pause()
db:section.db:para: Pauses all active sound instances which belong to this category.

db:section.db:title: pause()
db:section.db:para: Resumes all active sound instances from paused state which belong to this category.

db:section.db:title: stop()
db:section.db:para: Stops all active sound instances which belong to this category.
